statements: DELETE FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure WHERE before_data > 100 AND after_data < 50
DELETE FROM ConservationAfter WHERE measure_name = 'Tree Planting';
DELETE FROM ConservationBefore WHERE id = 1 AND measure_name = 'Habitat Restoration';
DELETE FROM ConservationMeasuresAfter WHERE measure_name = 'Biodiversity Conservation';
DELETE FROM conservation_measure_after WHERE measure_name = 'Habitat Restoration';
DELETE FROM ConservationResults WHERE measure_id = 3 AND after_effectiveness_score < 50;
